actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to prohibit Conrail from taking actions to damage its rail facilities and equipment before final disposition or sale of the interest of the United States in the Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to prohibit the Consolidated Rail Corporation (Conrail) from taking any action which would damage its rail facilities or equipment before final disposition or sale of the interest of the United States in the Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit Conrail from taking actions to damage its rail facilities and equipment before final disposition or sale of the interest of the United States in the Corporation.
